title: Fragments, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 8-harness satin with floats of continuous and discontinuous wefts
description: Fragments of a pattern which included within one repeat a ship at sea, flowering trees, man kneeling aiming gun at feline animal, seated man smoking pipe, and a peacock. Multi-colors on cream background. Chenille used for may details or entire motifs.  At least two intervals a narrow 1 3/8" band interrupted the pattern for a border at top and bottom. A small section of the repeated pattern was used for the border band.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 17th century.Medium: silk
Technique: 8-harness satin with floats of continuous and discontinuous wefts. 1974-74-1-a/j.
